text: Ia deravɨra oragh, ingangarir gumaziba ian azenibar dagheba isi, ezɨ ia me gifaragha egha men ivezir mabar anogoroke. Ezɨ ingangarir gumazir kaba me uan ivezibagh nɨghnɨgha egha Godɨn dɨa ghaze, a ian arazir kuraba ikarvagham. Ezɨ ingangarir gumazibar dɨmdiam, Ekiar Bar Gavgavim Itim, a baraki.
